title: Disney to lay off 7,000 workers, CEO Bob Iger says
description: The announcement came on Disney's earnings call on Wednesday.

title: Texas sues Biden administration over pharmacies filling abortion pill prescriptions
description: Texas is suing the Biden administration over guidance to retail pharmacies to fill prescriptions for abortion pills.

title: 4.9 million Fabuloso multipurpose cleaners recalled due to bacteria risk
description: A number of popular Fabuloso products were recalled Wednesday by the Colgate-Palmolive Company.

title: 'Wolfpack' police culture in Memphis sparked Tyre Nichols beating: Chief
description: The Memphis police department and fire department are under intense scrutiny following Tyre Nichols' death.

title: 2 Indiana men could face life in prison in teen's 1975 death
description: A judge says two Indiana men could face life in prison if they’re convicted in the slaying of a 17-year-old girl found dead in a river nearly a half-century ago

title: Memorial service to be held for murdered New Jersey councilwoman
description: A memorial will be held for New Jersey Councilwoman Eunice Dwumfour on Wednesday. She was shot and killed in her SUV last week.

title: Blinken says Chinese surveillance balloon program spread over 5 continents
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken said Wednesday the Chinese surveillance balloon program is spread over five continents.

title: Suspect arrested, 12 monkeys still missing from Louisiana zoo
description: Joseph Randall was arrested in connection with the theft of 12 squirrel monkeys from a Louisiana zoo last month. Police have not yet located the monkeys.

title: 2 children dead, 6 injured after city bus slams into day care near Montreal
description: Two children are dead and six others injured after a city bus crashed into a day care Wednesday in Laval, Quebec, a suburb of Montreal.

title: Michigan woman accused of fatal hit-and-run off to Thailand

title: Artisanal cobalt mining swallowing city in Democratic Republic of the Congo

title: Infant shot, 2 adults dead in house shooting

title: New York man who became ISIS sniper found guilty of providing support for terrorism
